Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: I see Numerous Identical "Lights/Objects" appearing nightly in the Eastern San Diego skies Almost Nightly
Object Shape: Cigar, Circle, Cross, Cylinder, Disc, Egg, Fireball, Flash, Oval, Sphere, Star-like, Other, Unknown
divs: sighting detailsim not a conspiracy theorist & i dont look under the bed for the boogie man but a friend & i saw sum very strange quick moving lights shooting around in the eastern san diego skies (on 12\22\11 around 2:45am) as we were sitting on the back patio smoking a cigarette (no, it was just a regular cigarette!) anyways, ever since that night ive been super vigilant & observant, of whats going on in the sky. i mean how much time do most people actually take on a daily basis to pay attention to whats going on around them, let alone above them! since then, i can honestly say, i see numerous lights\objects that are questionable & suspicious on a nightly basis! recently (within the last 4 days) ive seen alot of activity & have shown others as it is happening & no1 can rationalize or explain what it is we are witnessing. i know what a helicopter & a plane & a satellite look like flying in the night sky (sometimes there will actually be planes & helicopters sharing airspace w\ these objects & i cant help but ask myself & others, "cant they see this too?" i have many pix & video of what ive been seeing but can any1 help me make any sense of this
